00042 template<unsigned DIM>
00043 class CellwiseData
00044 {
00045     friend class TestCellwiseData;
00046 
00047 private:
00048 
00050     static CellwiseData* mpInstance;
00051 
00053     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* mpCellPopulation;
00054 
00056     bool mAllocatedMemory;
00057 
00059     unsigned mNumberOfVariables;
00060 
00062     std::vector<double> mData;
00063 
00065     std::vector<double> mConstantDataForTesting;
00066 
00068     bool mUseConstantDataForTesting;
00069 
00071     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00078     template<class Archive>
00079     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00080     {
00081         archive & mpCellPopulation;
00082         archive & mAllocatedMemory;
00083         archive & mNumberOfVariables;
00084         archive & mData;
00085         archive & mConstantDataForTesting;
00086         archive & mUseConstantDataForTesting;
00087     }
00088 
00089 protected:
00090 
00094     CellwiseData();
00095 
00096 public:
00097 
00101     static CellwiseData* Instance();
00102 
00106     virtual ~CellwiseData();
00107 
00112     static void Destroy();
00113 
00122     double GetValue(CellPtr pCell, unsigned variableNumber=0);
00123 
00131     void SetValue(double value, unsigned locationIndex, unsigned variableNumber=0);
00132 
00138     void SetCellPopulation(AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>* pCellPopulation);
00139 
00143     AbstractCellPopulation<DIM>& rGetCellPopulation();
00144 
00152     void SetNumCellsAndVars(unsigned numCells, unsigned numVars);
00153 
00159     void SetConstantDataForTesting(std::vector<double>& rValues);
00160 
00164     bool IsSetUp();
00165 
00170     void ReallocateMemory();
00171 
00175     unsigned GetNumVariables();
00176 };
